features: Gentle, Effective Cleansing - The French triple-milled process breaks down the soap into the finest flakes before molding them again. It results in a milder, longer lasting women's and men's soap that gently cleans your skin. The effect makes you look forward to every chance to jump in the shower. It's love in every bar. Our moisturizing soapis the best gift for women and also ideal gift for men.

6 Citrus Scents! - Invigorating and revitalizing, you get a choice of 6 citrus scents to start or end your day with—or as a break in the middle, like a long and indulgent coffee break. Introducing Tangerine, Bergamot, Grapefruit, Lemon, Petitgrain, and Wild Orange. All citrus bars contains organic ingredients and essential oil to smoothen the appearance of wrinkles, and for firmer and bouncier looking skin. Feel younger and energetic with every use of O Naturals Citrus Soap Bars.

Vegan and All-Natural - Every bar of soap at O Naturals is made with only organic ingredients, and often infused with essential oils. The Signature Citrus Collection also contains herbs, fruits, and more. It's in nature where we can find the best care for our skin. Watch as yours glows and softens over time with every natural bar soap for men and women, restoring it to its natural beauty. Perfect gift for vegans and sustainable gifts for the Eco-Conscious.

Luxurious Bath Quality - French triple milling our soaps creates such fine particles before remolding them together that it glides on your skin without any harsh tugging. It also creates a rich lather only achieved with high-quality handmade soaps, like O Naturals. When you feel the need for a pick-me-up or a treat for yourself, go for a pampering bath session with O Naturals all-natural soap for men, and women.

O Naturals Guarantee- At O Naturals, we believe that taking care of yourself requires taking care of your body on the inside and out. Our team of dedicated people strives to bring you the highest quality, natural and enjoyable skincare products. Embrace the healthier lifestyle with our gentle and kind skincare line. Not happy with your purchase? No worries! We provide a quick 30-day return policy.
body.description: O Naturals French Triple Milled Soap Bars Cold-Pressed to Perfection Milling is what thoroughly mixes the soap and any fragrances or extra ingredients added to the soap base, while squeezing out any extra moisture or air. Triple Milled Soaps contain less water and more actual soap creating a long-lasting hard soap. Our French Triple Milled Soaps are Designed with authentic, all natural and organic ingredients that will leave your face and body feeling cleansed, hydrated, moisturized and lux.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The O Naturals Citrus Soap Collection is a 6-piece 100% vegan soap set with Sustainable Palm Oil designed to revitalize and invigorate you from top to bottom. The natural, fresh citrus scents are sure to rejuvenate and revive your skin. Try six unique, French triple milled soap bars. SCENTS & SELF-CARE: This 6-piece soap selection is scented with our favorite phthalate-free fragrances created by our incredible French artisans * These vegan soap bars are made with organic ingredients, all natural. * O Naturals Soaps use Sustainable Palm Oil only!

Beautiful Scented Soaps With Our Favorite Phthalate-Free Fragrances Created By Our Incredible French Artisans Tangerine Tangerine brings hints of one of your favorite summer fruits, refreshing and wholesome. Wild Orange Wild Orange brings out the scent of nature’s energy, perhaps a sweet surprise you would stumble upon on a summer walk outside. Grapefruit Grapefruit gives it a hint of a natural, fresh fruit salad.

Beautiful Scented Soaps Petitgrain Petitgrain has a delightful greenish woody orange smell to it, like an orchard in the French Countryside. Bergamot Bergamot is perhaps the most beautiful of citrus scents bringing the combination of Lemon and Bitter Orange into a truly vibrant fragrance. Lemon Lemon suggests the taste of lemonade on a warm day, a truly clean and energetic smell.

About O Naturals O Naturals is about natural living inside and out. We bring a variety of natural and organic skincare products to you from the Hemp Collection, Dead Sea Salt Scrubs, Bar Soaps, and more. O Naturals takes pride in using natural and organic ingredients in our products. O Naturals French Triple Milled Soap Bars Cold-Pressed to Perfection Milling is what thoroughly mixes the soap and any fragrances or extra ingredients added to the soap base, while squeezing out any extra moisture or air. Triple Milled Soaps contain less water and more actual soap creating a long-lasting hard soap. Our French Triple Milled Soaps are Designed with authentic, all natural and organic ingredients that will leave your face and body feeling cleansed, hydrated, moisturized and lux.

How to Maximize the Use of Your Soap Bar Prepare Your Soap Begin by cutting your soap into halves or thirds. Put the pieces into a soap bag so that you can scrub with them. Storing Your Soap Store your soap in a soap dish drain off water and let it dry. Place it as far away as possible from the shower head.. Use a Loofah or Washcloth Using a loofah or washcloth uses less soap than scrubbing by hand while producing a more luxurious lather. Take Cooler Showers Take cooler showers as the hot water has a harder time creating lather. This means your soap bar lasts longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don't like a lot of additives in my soap so this is perfect for me. It has a scented smell but not so strong that it is overwhelming, very calming, and natural. It comes exactly as packaged. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game Changer Soap
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the activated charcoal black bar soap, and I must say it exceeded my expectations! This soap not only looks sleek but also does wonders for my skin. The activated charcoal helps to deeply cleanse and detoxify, leaving my skin feeling refreshed and revitalized. I love how it lathers up nicely and has a pleasant, subtle scent. Plus, it's gentle enough for daily use, and I've noticed a significant improvement in the clarity and smoothness of my skin since I started using it. Overall, I highly recommend this activated charcoal black bar soap for anyone looking to achieve a clearer and healthier complexion. It's a game-changer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I'm pleased that I was able to find a collection of natural soaps for such a reasonable price. I'm in love with the short ingredients list on the soap sleeves. I used one for the first time today--I picked the Bergamot bar--and was also pleased with the smooth lather it made. It was good enough to shave with, and my skin did not feel dried out after using. (which, yay. bar soaps do that to me more often than not, so I love that these didn't).To nitpick, I'd been under the impression that they were scented with real essential oils, but they are not. The soap sleeve clearly indicates that they are scented with "parfum" (perfume). They smell pleasant, but they do smell like perfumed scents (not the real essential oils), and they smell mostly the same (except the lemon and grapefruit). To be fair, this is my misunderstanding, as the Amazon ad in no way indicates that they DO include essential oils. I just happened to click over from another one of their sets that actually does, then didn't bother verifying that this one did, too. To others like me who are sensitive to manufactured scents, though, please take this into account. However, I can't fault the actual product--the soaps are great quality, and I'm sure 98% of people won't care one way or another and will find the scents pleasant, cheerful, and mild.Last note: I love the packaging. They come in a cute little orange box, and the illustrations on the individual soap sleeves are beautiful. I feel like this would make a great gift for someone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Organic, smells great!
reviews.reviewText: We have been using this soap for a few years now. It is very nice and does not make our skin have allergic reactions. It does not leave a film or a lingering smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the money, they are great. And I love the fact that it comes in a variety of different scents. Great for oily skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Be careful with Charcoal soap
reviews.reviewText: The Charcoal soap is actually one of the good soaps I bought, it cleans your skin and gives enough foam and all, BUT this is not just for daily use. I have used it for more than an year just to realize my skin has been damaged and become completely dry. I had no other option than stop using it, otherwise it’s a good soap for occasional use.I have used Black Tea & Tea Tree Oil Soap which was good, I wish they provided an option to purchase that soap alone.Bumping it to 3 star as they have good customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for skin
reviews.reviewText: I honestly love this soap, I’ve used about 4 of the pack that I brought and will honestly buy more. It’s gentle to my skin and doesn’t feel make me feel like it’s drying it up. The scent is not overwhelming either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This whole set of soaps all work great. Always makes your skin feel squeaky clean, never leaving your skin oily. Will def buy again!
It was a gift. I got this product for my son ,he has skin problems. It works great . Make sure to wipe out the bath and shower right after.
These are very good bars of soap. They are large and last a long time.
nice buy , scent is great and good feel on the skin
Los aromas son muy agradables y naturales. Envío en fecha prevista.

reviews.reviewTitle: SAPONE NERO AL CARBONE ATTIVO. Ottimo prodotto per la pulizia a fondo del viso e del corpo.
reviews.reviewText: Sgrassante e adatto pe. pulizie a fondo. E' anche possibile con la schiuma, farsi una maschera facciale da tenere per qualche minuto. Risultato ottimo pur non seccando la pelle.
